metadata.title: CVE-2023-52688 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: ath12k: fix the error handler of rfkill configWhen the core rfkill config throws error, it should free theallocated resources. Currently it is not freeing the core pdevcreate resources. Avoid this issue by calling the core pdevdestroy in the error handler of core rfkill config.Found this issue in the code review and it is compile tested only.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
